title: EasyMeet- Chat, Meet, Date
description:
EasyMeet is a place you can date someone easily.
There's no need to worry about anything else.
Just give me a cool date and then we'll see...
Sign up now and you'll get a date by tomorrow through following steps...
1. Check out who is as lonely as you nearby.
2. Choose some cuties you would like to meet by suggestion list or their status.
3. Talk to them, anytime, anything...
4. Or just simply sign up a date?
5. If you're hot enough, tell everyone your date plan and wait ;)
Don't hesitate to download EasyMeet now.
After all, a date is worth a thousands words.
Others you need to know
※You are not able to search people with the same gender on EasyMeet.
※We provide EasyMeet+ for you to become a VIP for 5 days with only 0.99 USD
※Your privacy and safety come the first to us.
※We support Chinese, English and Japanese.
※At least 4.0 version of Android system.
※Monthly VIP is an auto renewable subscription. If you don't want to renew the subscription for the next month, please cancel the subscription before the end of the current billing cycle.
Please follow the steps to cancel the subscription:
1. Go to payments.google.com.
2. Along the left side of your screen, select Bills and accounts.
Select the subscription you want to cancel > Cancel subscription.
Important: Uninstalling an app will not automatically stop your subscription. You must cancel your subscription to end your subscription. If you uninstall the app without canceling your subscription, you will still be charged.

※Monthly VIP is an auto renewable subscription. If you don't want to renew the subscription for the next month, please cancel the subscription before the end of the current billing cycle.

Please follow the steps to cancel the subscription:
1. Go to payments.google.com.
2. Along the left side of your screen, select Bills and accounts.

Important: Uninstalling an app will not automatically stop your subscription. You must cancel your subscription to end your subscription. If you uninstall the app without canceling your subscription, you will still be charged.
